testcase.name: dropUsersTable
testcase.system-out: Hibernate: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users

testcase.name: createUsersTable
testcase.system-out: Hibernate: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users Hibernate: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(50), lastName VARCHAR(50), age TINYINT)

testcase.name: cleanUsersTable
testcase.system-out: Hibernate: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users Hibernate: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(50), lastName VARCHAR(50), age TINYINT) User с именем – Ivan добавлен в базу данных Hibernate: delete from User Hibernate: select user0_.id as id1_0_, user0_.age as age2_0_, user0_.lastName as lastname3_0_, user0_.name as name4_0_ from User user0_
